title: Signing In to Basic Auth Website
preconditions: User is authenticated and has the URL for Basic Auth Website (https://the-internet.herokuapp.com/basic_auth)
User opens the browser and navigates to the Basic Auth Website URL
User verifies that the Browser supports JavaScript
User presses the "Sign In" button on the Basic Auth Website
4. JavaScript code is executed on the page
There are no alternative flows for this use case.
postconditions: User is redirected to the main website if the authentication is successful
User sees an error message "Not authorized" if the authentication fails
Browser cache is updated with the new URL if the authentication is successful
This use case focuses on the user's actions and the expected behavior, making it easy to test and understand.
